Text: There are NO Subs you fucking moron . Now where do I get the subtitles ?

Shawbaday don't be such a baby. Find your own. Do you have others wipe your ass for you too, kiddo?
As it happens, it appears that there are no subs available just yet - but I'm sure some will arrive some day soonish. 
Not that an idiot like you would have the patience. Which leads me to ask: why would you be interested in a movie like this anyway, stroppy child that you are?
